audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific percentage with clear scope (average company, annual)

tier_verification: Correctly classified as tier 1. Ramp represents genuine transformation of corporate finance from manual, slow processes to AI-automated platform model. The combination of 3x productivity gains, weeks-to-minutes procurement cycles, and systematic expense reduction across thousands of customers indicates fundamental business model change, not just efficiency improvements. AI is central to the value proposition - without it, the dramatic time and cost improvements disappear.
